page.title: 19Onley Prison Y.C.C.,Rugby
page.content: This is a prison for young offenders of 16-21 years of age and accommodates 420 prisoners.The maximum term served is 5 years.All crimes are represented exept murder.There are no female prisoners.Onley Y.C.C. was opened in 1969.It is a modern building with good facilities for the prisoners.The prison staff are strict but kind and devise many ways to help the prisoners improve their lives.Trusted prisoners are allowed out to work unsupervised in the community.The prisoners are accomodated in single cells and there are some punishment cells for violent prisoners.These are rarely used and only for short periods.Most prisoners work around the Prison during the day cleaning,gardening and doing general maintenance.The prison has its own market garden which provides a number of vegetables to help the economy.
